lines.text: If you strike that girl, I'll quit! And what's more, I want what I'm worth.
I'll give you fifty dollars a week.
lines.character: The Circus Proprietor and Ring Master
The Circus Proprietor and Ring Master
The Circus Proprietor and Ring Master

lines.text: [the Circus Proprietor agrees and they shake on it]

lines.character: The Circus Proprietor and Ring Master

lines.text: I've run away from the circus.
Where's the funny man? Bring on the funny man!
Bye. Thank you for the egg.
I told you the lions were dangerous!
That's all right; I've got him insured.
lines.character: The Circus Proprietor and Ring Master
